rows.label: qst201311_msg0001
rows.name: So you're Darryth the informant.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0002
rows.name:
That's my name and that's my trade,
yes. Some information you're after?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0003
rows.name:
We're looking for any information you
can provide about the incident with the
disappearing children.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0005
rows.name: Ah, that nasty little business.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0006
rows.name:
I've been looking into it already for
some other clients, but it's bizarre how
little information seems to be out there.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0007
rows.name:
It's got to the point where everyone
thinks they've been spirited away by
supernatural forces or something.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0008
rows.name:
So much as it pains me to admit it,
I really don't have any information
for you on that front. Sorry.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0010
rows.name: Oh... I see...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0011
rows.name:
Sorry, did I just hear you talking
about vanishing children?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0012
rows.name: Yes, we were. Why?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0013
rows.name:
It's my daughter Maqqa... She said she
was going out to play, but she still
hasn't come back.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0014
rows.name:
I can't seem to find any of the kids
who were with her, either. It's like
they've vanished into thin air...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0015
rows.name:
I was just worrying that this might
have something to do with all those
scary spiritings away...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0019
rows.name:
Do you know where your daughter
went to play?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0020
rows.name:
I'm afraid I'm not sure where she
would have gone exactly...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0021
rows.name:
Me and the other parents have been
out looking for them...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0022
rows.name:
Maybe some of the others would
know more than I do.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0023
rows.name:
In that case, we would like to ask
the other parents a few questions.
Do you know where we can find them?

rows.label: qst201311_msg0024
rows.name:
Well, let's see... Lacie lives in the
Entertainment District, and Celtie
lives in the Commercial District.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0025
rows.name:
Oh, and Daffydd should be somewhere
around Gwenith Paddies. It'll be easiest
if you go and find them directly.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0026
rows.name:
Thank you very much.
You've been a great help.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0027
rows.name:
And don't worry - we will find
your children without fail.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0028
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst201311_msg0029
rows.name:
Yes. You just sit tight and wait
for their safe return.

rows.label: qst201311_msg0030
rows.name:
Oh, thank you so much!
I wish you the best of luck...

rows.label: qst201311_msg0031
rows.name:
First things first, let's go find these
other parents and ask them for clues.
